item.title: What I saw at Auschwitz
item.description: I’m writing this on Monday 3 February, having been awake for about 18 hours on little sleep, so this is unlikely to be my finest prose. However, I wanted to write down this stream of consciousness while my memories were still relatively fresh, rather than delay and let the imprints fade. On Sunday 2 February 2025, I visited Auschwitz-Birkenau for the first time. Earlier in the week, we had marked the 80th anniversary of the liberation of the camp.

item.title: Stuff That I Like
item.description: I wanted a place to talk about stuff that I like. If we have similar interests, you might enjoy something here. P.S. you can’t use any of this for guessing my log-ins. Books It’s quite hard for me to really make a good list encompassing all genres. So far, I’ve listed books in my main nerd fiction genres. I find myself profoundly affected by recency bias when trying to think about other specific books to mention.

item.title: Why
item.description: Why do I have this site? While is slightly odd for a nobody like me to have a website, I don’t think it’s unusual to want some sort of canvas for self-expression. Besides, this is a very cheap hobby. I use a free GitHub account and a domain name costing all of Â£5. Regarding the blog specifically, see Orwell’s reasons for writing: Sheer egoism. It goes without saying. Aesthetic enthusiasm. I think a blog is a good outlet for creativity.
